snippet.title: Akari - The Five Eyed Fox (indie fox metroidvania) Early Teaser
snippet.description:
Akari - The Five Eyed Fox is a fast paced Metroidvania in early development. 
Slash and Dash your way through diverse beautiful worlds as a fox imbued with the magical power of a light. 
Face off against an army of darkness and explore an emotional story as Akari regains the memories of what caused this horrific dark invasion.
When the darkness becomes too much to bare… 
SHINE BRIGHTER.
